en: Tom walked with his shoulder into the wind.
ko: 톰은 바람에 맞서 어깨를 펴고 걸었어.

en: Coming home having accomplished his task, Tom appeared larger.
ko: 일을 다 마치고 집에 온 톰은 더 늠름해 보였어.

en: Mary is doing things precisely.
Tom's eyes are powerful.
There is power in Tom's eyes.
This summer resort is no longer as popular as it used to be.
Her mother speaks Italian.
I apologize for yesterday.
I'm so sorry about yesterday.
He fell asleep while driving and caused an accident.
The city was destroyed in the war.
Is this really spaghetti?
The person ruling from the shadows was Mary.
Before graduation, I went to visit my teacher to express my gratitude for everything he'd done for me.
ko: 졸업하기 전에 그동안 감사했다고 선생님 찾아뵀어.

en: That's the person who Mary's really interested in.
ko: 저 사람이 메리가 진짜 관심 있어 하는 사람이야.

en: There's still some room in the closet.
He has a chubby face.
He fell asleep while he was driving and caused an accident.
Can I have your name and telephone number?
Today I passed a person on the street wearing a refreshing fragrance.
ko: 오늘 길 가다 상큼한 향기 나는 사람을 스쳐 지나갔어.

en: Tom is refreshing, honest and a good young man.
Tom's whole face shows what he is thinking.
ko: 톰은 무슨 생각 하는지 얼굴에 다 보여.

en: Tom unintentionally expressed his feelings, but did not let me know what he was thinking.
ko: 톰이 무심결에 속마음을 내비치긴 했지만, 무슨 생각인지는 안 알려줬어.

en: I felt for Tom, who was away from home, when he said in a lonely voice, "It doesn't snow here."
ko: 타지 생활 하는 톰이 쓸쓸하게 "여기는 눈이 안 와"라고 했을 때 안쓰러웠어.

en: I was thinking that Tom could be a vegetarian. He had a cabbage roll.
ko: 톰이 채식주의자인가 싶었어. 양배추 롤을 먹더라고.

en: While I am gone, please don't forget to feed my cat and water the plants.
ko: 나 없는 동안 고양이 밥 주고 화분에 물 주는 거 잊지 마.

en: I spent a one month holiday in Japan and it was wonderful.
ko: 일본에서 한 달 동안 휴가 보냈는데 진짜 좋았어.

en: Excuse me but may I ask for your name and contact information?
ko: 실례지만 성함이랑 연락처 좀 알 수 있을까요?

en: Those who know nothing but the countryside have no sense of countryside, and those who have not set foot outside the city do not know what a city really is.
ko: 시골밖에 모르는 사람은 시골의 멋을 모르고, 도시를 벗어나 본 적 없는 사람은 도시가 뭔지 진짜로 몰라.

en: In the countryside, the breaths of the grass, the trees, and the rocks have the foul smell of humans. They call to me from all directions, and they cling to me. But in the city, even the passengers of a jam-packed train are as quiet as pebbles on the riverbed, and everyone is only thinking of themselves.
ko: 시골에선 풀, 나무, 바위의 숨결에서 역한 사람 냄새가 나. 사방에서 날 부르며 달라붙는 느낌이야. 하지만 도시는 꽉 찬 전철 안에서도 다들 조약돌처럼 조용하고 자기 생각만 해.

en: Does Meiji University have a medical school?
I stepped on something weird.
Kick! Kick!
"Has the rain stopped?" "No, it's still raining."
Thank you for yesterday.
If you go out wearing that little you will catch a cold.
ko: 그렇게 얇게 입고 나가면 감기 걸려.

en: If you go out so lightly dressed, you'll catch a cold.
ko: 너무 가볍게 입고 나가면 감기 걸릴 거야.

en: My cat is hungry.
Your battery power is low.
Your battery is running low.
Your battery is low.

Cannibal Corpse is an American death metal band.

en: When first year students write compositions, shouldn't they leave spaces between words?
ko: 1학년들이 글 쓸 때 띄어쓰기 해야 되는 거 아냐?

Could you recommend a good book?
Little by little, I am learning kanji.
If it is even possible, translating jokes is quite hard.
ko: 농담 번역하는 건 가능하다고 해도 정말 어려워.

en: I overslept so I was late to school.
I slept in, so I was late to school.
There are people who speak of wisdom with no clue of what respect is.
ko: 예의가 뭔지도 모르면서 지혜를 논하는 사람들이 있어요.

en: To behold a curious spectacle.
Tom doesn't know how the computer works.
You need to look in all directions before crossing the street, even at a crosswalk when the light is green.
ko: 초록불이라도 횡단보도 건널 땐 좌우를 잘 살펴야 돼요.

en: Tom ran off like a coward.
I've been all over Europe.
I've been all over town looking for Tom.
ko: 탐 찾느라고 온 동네를 다 뒤졌어요.

en: Masturbation leads to insanity.
The name of Tom's wife is Mary and his son's is Horace.
ko: 탐의 아내 이름은 메리고 아들 이름은 호레이스예요.

en: I am twelve years old.
The kid kept all of his money in a piggy bank.
ko: 그 애는 돈을 전부 저금통에 모아뒀어요.

en: Is someone knocking on the door?
Life can only be understood backwards, but it must be lived forwards.
ko: 인생은 뒤를 돌아봐야만 이해되지만, 살 때는 앞을 보고 살아야 해요.

en: It hurts!
"You really overthink things."
I appreciate sweet things and books.
He's preparing for the journey.
By the way, next week will be our university graduation ceremony.
ko: 그나저나 다음 주가 우리 대학교 졸업식이에요.

en: My boss is a jerk.
There is a basket full of bananas on the counter.
ko: 카운터 위에 바나나가 가득 든 바구니가 있어요.

en: What's the product's code?
After years of womanising, Tom finally settled down with Mary.
ko: 여자 꽁무니만 쫓아다니던 탐이 결국 메리랑 결혼해서 정착했어요.

en: Tom has braided his beard.
This laptop is thin and light.
They are talking past each other.
I wiped the window sill with a paper towel.
The accident happened suddenly.
That is not Tom.
I don't want to watch TV.
You're going to Boston next week, right?
I don't want to watch television.
Tom isn't afraid.
Most of our employees are young.
It's been warm the last few days.
How did we win?
Drop your guns.
Did you notice any errors?
I'll go wash my hands.
Tom explained in detail but I don't understand it.

en: I'm Argentinian.
"I'm jealous of your height." "Really? There's nothing good about being tall. You hit your head on the ceiling and all that."
ko: "너 키 커서 부럽다." "그래? 키 크면 좋은 거 하나도 없어. 천장에 머리나 부딪히고 말이야."

en: "It must be great to be tall." "Do you think so? It's not really that great. You keep bumping your head on the ceiling."
ko: "키 크면 좋겠다." "그렇게 생각해? 진짜 별로야. 자꾸 천장에 머리 부딪히거든."

en: "It looks like the typhoon is getting closer." "Yeah, it's going to suck if school's cancelled tomorrow."
ko: "태풍이 가까이 오고 있나 봐." "응, 내일 학교 휴교하면 진짜 별로겠다."

en: I was ready too.
Tom spent many hours using the language website, tatoeba.org, to improve his English.
ko: 탐은 영어 실력을 키우려고 타토에바라는 언어 사이트에서 시간을 많이 보냈어요.

en: I can't remember doing that.
After eating the ice cream, my stomach began to hurt.
Living is dangerous.
I like ice cream.
Tom got dressed and slipped on his shoes.
Have you got time?

Will we make it in time?

Will he make it in time?
Will she make it in time?
Sad.
That is a dog.
I like Irish music.
What kind of souvenirs did you buy?

en: Korpiklaani is one of my favorite folk metal bands.
ko: 코르피클라니는 내가 제일 좋아하는 포크 메탈 밴드 중 하나야.

Excuse me, may I have a spoon?

ko: 피아노 말고 다른 악기 다룰 줄 아는 거 있어?

ko: 피아노 말고 다른 악기 연주하는 거 있어?

I'm sorry that I'm dressed like this.
I'm sorry I'm dressed like this.
You're my only hope.
You don't like me anymore, do you?

If you want to include papers that have been submitted to academic journals, you are limited to those that have been accepted for publication.
ko: 학술지에 제출한 논문을 포함하고 싶으면 게재 승인된 것만 가능해.

en: Beethoven went over to the piano, sat down and began to play.
ko: 베토벤은 피아노로 가서 앉더니 연주를 시작했어.

en: "I forgot to tell you but, I need sandals so bring them." "Huh? You should have told me earlier."
ko: "깜빡하고 말 안 했는데, 나 샌들 필요하니까 좀 가져다줘." "어? 진작 말하지 그랬어."

en: Thank you for helping us.
Thanks for the email yesterday. Sorry I didn't reply.
ko: 어제 메일 고마워. 답장 못 해서 미안해.

en: It's crowded, so let's take the next train.
This one's crowded, so let's take the next train.
ko: 이거 사람 많으니까 다음 거 타자.

en: This train is crowded, so let's take the next one.
ko: 이 기차는 꽉 찼으니까 다음 거 타자.

en: Tom doesn't seem like a boy.

How is the weather in Boston?
Are they all the same price?
Do they all cost the same?
Do these all cost the same?
Are these all the same price?

I visited Paris, but I didn't climb the Eiffel tower, since I'm afraid of heights.

en: I thought that as well, in my younger days.
"Doesn't that smell fantastic?" "Yeah!"
Mary is Tom's stepsister.
Sorry, I forgot to tell you something important.

en: If a man is nice to me I end up falling for him right away.
ko: 남자가 나한테 잘해주면 금방 좋아하게 되더라.

en: I'm a bit of an open book.
ko: 난 좀 속이 다 보이는 편이야.

en: What kind of songs does Tom sing at karaoke?
Your ice cream will melt if you don't eat it quickly.

en: If you have a fever, you should go to the hospital right away.
If you have a fever, it would be a good idea to go to the hospital right away.

en: First, please take about 3 minutes to introduce yourself.
Why are you still awake?
Mary is Tom's step-sister.
I recently broke up with my boyfriend of three years.
ko: 나 얼마 전에 3년 사귄 남자친구랑 헤어졌어.

en: Absolutely!
How about tomorrow night at nine?
I want him to think I'm a good person.
ko: 그 사람이 나를 좋은 사람이라고 생각하면 좋겠어.

en: I want him to think well of me.
ko: 그 사람이 나를 좋게 봐줬으면 좋겠어.

en: Tom is a notorious procrastinator.
Tom isn't very manly.
There are seedless grapes and seedless watermelons. I wonder if there are seedless mangoes.
ko: 씨 없는 포도랑 씨 없는 수박은 있는데, 씨 없는 망고도 있을까?

en: English is a compulsory subject.
What's the biggest difference?
Family is important.
That's unrealistic.

We were different.

I felt comfortable.
It happened in 2013.

It seems probable.
Everybody started to panic.
Nothing can stop them.
Tom is not able to swim.
At first, she thought it was a joke.
I can't listen to music at night anymore because my headphones broke.

en: Just as the fairy tale finished, the child had already fallen asleep.
I don't like rainy weather.
When our parents aren't there, my younger brother takes on a completely different manner.
ko: 부모님 안 계실 때 내 남동생은 태도가 완전히 달라져.

en: Even though I witnessed the incident, I pretended not to have seen anything.
ko: 그 사건을 목격했는데도 아무것도 못 본 척했어.

What planet do you live on?
My telephone number is 9876-5432.
They made a frame with tape.

This time, I'll come with my sister.

Tom wants to go home, but he can't.
